behavior.name: ExecuteJointTrajectoryAndSay
behavior.author: disRecord
behavior.description: Prononce text (TextCommand voice/say) and execute JointTrajectory at the same time.

param.name: joint_trajectory
param.label: joint_trajectory
param.hint: Joint trajectory name. May be empty if no movement is needed.

param.name: text_delay
param.label: text_delay
param.hint: Delay between animation and text verbolization.

param.name: is_relative
param.label: is_relative
param.hint: Set true if trajectory is relative (ExecuteJointTrajectoryRelative).
